jrnl.system.search package¶

Submodules¶

jrnl.system.search.entry module¶

Search entries using a SQL alike query language.

class jrnl.system.search.entry.Searcher(journal)[source]¶

Bases: object

do_query(entries, selector)[source]¶

Filter the entries with the given selector.

selector is a tuple like (field, op, value) for instance ("datetime", "==", "12.3.2016").

Returns: list of entries

query(selectors)[source]¶

Apply all selectors using do_query.

Returns: list of entries

select(entries, fields)[source]¶

Select the specified field from the entries.

Returns: list of dicts with the selected values

class jrnl.system.search.entry.SimpleParser[source]¶

Bases: object

parse_query(query)[source]¶
